In the near future a revolutionary online game will be the most popular form of entertainment. Every week, millions of Internet users watch convicts struggling to survive as if they were characters in a virtual game. Kable (Gerard Butler), a prisoner, will become the star of this game. For the player, Kable is a simple character, but for the resistance group he is the key to victory. In the midst of this battle, and under the command of a teenager, Kable will have to use all your skills extravirtuais to win the game and overthrow the system.
